question: Which of the following was the theme of the 7th Conference of the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA)?
option1: Role of Parliament and Parliamentarians in achieving the SDGs
option2: Envisioning Parliamentary Paths towards a Diverse and Developed South Asia
explanation: The 7th Conference of the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA) was held in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. The theme of the Conference was "Role of Legislators". The Speaker of Lok Sabha, Om Birla inaugurated the conference. The discussions of the conference was in the context of the Capacity building of legislator for clear scrutiny of Budgetary proposals.
